name: Dang Good Ice | Same Day Ice Delivery in Vancouver

owner.name: Dang Good Ice | Same Day Ice Delivery in Vancouver (Owner)

address: Dang Good Ice | Same Day Ice Delivery in Vancouver, 3757 Jacombs Rd Unit 155, Richmond, BC V6V 2R3

featured_reviews.review_id: Dang Good Ice is the best in the city! We have been purchasing their ice for almost two years for our Cold Plunge Crew events to provide our guests with the best ice bath experience. They have an incredible customer service and delivery. They are always on time.
featured_reviews.review_text: Dang Good Ice is the best in the city! We have been purchasing their ice for almost two years for our Cold Plunge Crew events to provide our guests with the best ice bath experience. They have an incredible customer service and delivery. They are always on time.

featured_reviews.review_id:
The marketing agency that I work for has used Dang Good Ice delivery service on numerous occasions for various events and parties that we have hosted over the past few years! They have been nothing short of fantastic in terms of product, service, as well as fair pricing!

Highly recommended!
featured_reviews.review_text:
The marketing agency that I work for has used Dang Good Ice delivery service on numerous occasions for various events and parties that we have hosted over the past few years! They have been nothing short of fantastic in terms of product, service, as well as fair pricing!

Highly recommended!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for kind words. We hope your summer bbq went well. Looking forward to servicing you for your ice delivery needs

featured_reviews.review_id:
We've recently had an outdoor event server 700+ people, and Dang Good came in at the last min to help us serve cool down drinks to our attendees! The big cooler rental was able to keep the ice overnight to be used in the early morning next day because the ice we needed outside of their delivery window.

The delivery service was fast, simple, and totally reliable, especially on the weekends!

Thank you to Christina, Jeff, and the rest of the team to making this happen. Many happy faces that day. I will be putting them on my order for my next event!
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow, what an incredible event you hosted for 700+ people! We're absolutely thrilled that we could assist you with our Vancouver Ice Delivery service, especially on such short notice.

featured_reviews.review_id:
We had an emergency and needed wet ice for our facility. They were able to arrive to us in 2 hours without issues and understood our concerns and documents required.
Good pricing and speedy delivery and great customer service. Add this company to your contact list.
Will use again in the future.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much. Hope you've been keeping cool!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Dang Good Ice was the perfect service that I needed!

They delivered on time, had the ice on location inside the venue just as asked for. Great communication and suggest the right amount of ice for our event.

The large cooler was great for the event as well, kept the ice cold all night.

Will definitely use them again!
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We're thrilled to have provided the perfect service for your needs. It's wonderful to know that our ice delivery was on time and set up

featured_reviews.review_id: We used Dang Good Ice for our Pitt Meadows Airport Day beer garden and I can't recommend them enough.  They were professional and helped determine the perfect amount of ice to use for the event!  They also supplied us with a mobile ice caddy to use on the day of the event to keep the ice cold and on-hand and it was a life-saver.  Delivery of the ice and pick-up of the caddy was a breeze and we will definitely be using them again for future events.
featured_reviews.review_text: We used Dang Good Ice for our Pitt Meadows Airport Day beer garden and I can't recommend them enough.  They were professional and helped determine the perfect amount of ice to use for the event!  They also supplied us with a mobile ice caddy to use on the day of the event to keep the ice cold and on-hand and it was a life-saver.  Delivery of the ice and pick-up of the caddy was a breeze and we will definitely be using them again for future events.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We're thrilled to have been a part of your Pitt Meadows Airport Day beer garden event. It's wonderful to hear that our ICE services contributed positively to the event's success.

featured_reviews.review_id: When you're throwing an event, having vendors you can trust makes all the difference. Dang Good Ice makes getting ice easy and streamlined. They're responsive, accommodating, punctual, and super friendly. Always a pleasure working with them.
featured_reviews.review_text: When you're throwing an event, having vendors you can trust makes all the difference. Dang Good Ice makes getting ice easy and streamlined. They're responsive, accommodating, punctual, and super friendly. Always a pleasure working with them.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words and positive feedback regarding our ice delivery service! We understand how crucial it is to have reliable vendors when organizing an event, and we're thrilled to be that trusted choice for you.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great service. I've been using them since 2016 and they have never let me down. Lot's of last minute orders that were delivered quickly and without incident. Thanks Guys
featured_reviews.review_text: Great service. I've been using them since 2016 and they have never let me down. Lot's of last minute orders that were delivered quickly and without incident. Thanks Guys
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: It has been a pleasure serving you Len thanks for making us Vancouver's Best Ice Delivery Company. We look forward to serving you in the near future.
